msg: make RuntimeInfo a property of TuscanyRuntime so a host can set it

author: jmargaris
msg: If the request has a request method set on it use it

author: sichen
msg: Added form widget style to use with default-table-style.  Use this if you're getting squished columns and want the form table to span the whole container.  Also outlines the table in a border.

author: jboynes
msg: move RuntimeInfo to host-api module to allow implementation to be supplied by the host
